Posts.Content: Jul 16, 2018 12:04PM - edited Jul 16, 2018 12:05PM by jods520 Hello, I am a recent member of the "club". De Novo Stage IV with mets to hip bone and spine, December 2017
Posts.Title: How Many Are We? zarovka SimonH

Posts.Content: Dec 28, 2017 03:54PM jods520 wrote: Hi everyone- I am newly diagnosed (12/18) and will start my chemo likely next week. The mass is large and in my lymph nodes so I need to start soon. Does not give me a lot of time to prep or do research on what to expect, so I appreciate all of the information here. Still soaking in my diagnosis. I will be on an AC regimen initially- does anyone know if a cold cap would help to prevent hair loss? To me, that is the most scary of all possible side effects. I also have a weak stomach to begin with so am just hoping I am not vomiting all day for 4 months straight! Glad to know there is a community out there to ask and answer questions. The unknown is scary.
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo in November 2017 Aymerz33 star2017
